This was deemed unacceptable or unworkable in these schools and they chose to withdraw from the study. In two of these four schools, the randomisation allocation for one year group proved unacceptable to the school, but in another year group the teachers were willing to work with the randomisation – thus only one instead of two year groups stayed in the study.
